en.text:
What is it?

You can contact me (The Infinity's) here.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about this page or questions about Scratch, GitHub, etc.

Prohibited matters

・Things that put a load on the server such as spam

The data has probably arrived, so please refrain from sending it over and over again.

All of my websites are created for free, so there are limitations on bandwidth, etc.

・Slander, harassment, etc.

Block if there are too many.
